product_name: The North Face  Horizon Folding Bill Cap
long_description: With quick-drying fabric and a foldable brim, the Horizon Folding Bill Cap from The North Face is easy to bring on every adventure, whether you're headed around the block or on a multi-country trip.
short_description: With quick-drying fabric and a foldable brim, the Horizon Folding Bill Cap from The North Face is easy to bring on every adventure, whether you're headed around the block or on a multi-country trip.
